selected_quotes: #Autism research supports view #IntellectualDisability #ASD are on a continuum not different clinical entities
Highly comorbid #autism spectrum disorders #intellectualdisability share a number of clinically-relevant phenomena.
#Autism spectrum disorders (ASD) and #intellectualdisability (ID) share a number of clinically-relevant phenomena.
Findings support idea that #ASD # #IintellectualDisability lie on a continuum are not different entities #autism

citation.abstract: As well as being highly comorbid conditions, autism spectrum disorders (ASD) and intellectual disability (ID) share a number of clinically-relevant phenomena. This raises questions about similarities and overlap in diagnosis and aetiological pathways that may exist for both conditions.
citation.title: Maternal Conditions and Perinatal Characteristics Associated with Autism Spectrum Disorder and Intellectual Disability
